00033 inline size_t tcl_hash(const char *s) {
00034   register size_t ret = 0;
00035 
00036   for (; *s; ++s)
00037     ret += (ret << 3) + (unsigned)*s;
00038 
00039   return ret;
00040 }
00041 
00045 inline size_t tcl_hash(const void *data, size_t len, size_t seed) {
00046   register size_t ret = seed;
00047   register const uint8_t *dp = (uint8_t *)data, *end = dp + len;
00048 
00049   for (; dp < end; ++dp)
00050     ret += (ret << 3) + *dp;
00051 
00052   return ret;
00053 }
00054 
00055 #define HT_TCLHASH_DO2(p, i) \
00056   ret += (ret << 3) + p[i]; ret += (ret << 3) + p[i+1]
00057 
00058 #define HT_TCLHASH_DO4(p, i) HT_TCLHASH_DO2(p, i); HT_TCLHASH_DO2(p, i+2);
00059 #define HT_TCLHASH_DO8(p, i) HT_TCLHASH_DO4(p, i); HT_TCLHASH_DO4(p, i+4);
00060 
00064 inline size_t tcl_hash2(const void *data, size_t len, size_t seed) {
00065   register size_t ret = seed;
00066   register const uint8_t *dp = (uint8_t *)data;
00067 
00068   if (len >= 8) do {
00069     HT_TCLHASH_DO8(dp, 0);
00070     dp += 8;
00071     len -= 8;
00072   } while (len >= 8);
00073 
00074   if (len > 0) do {
00075     ret += (ret << 3) + *dp++;
00076   } while (--len);
00077 
00078   return ret;
00079 }
00080 
00081 struct TclHash {
00082   size_t operator()(const void *start, size_t len, size_t seed) const {
00083     return tcl_hash(start, len, seed);
00084   }
00085 
00086   size_t operator()(const void *start, size_t len) const {
00087     return tcl_hash(start, len, 0);
00088   }
00089 
00090   size_t operator()(const String& s) const {
00091     return tcl_hash(s.c_str(), s.length(), 0);
00092   }
00093 
00094   size_t operator()(const char *s) const { return tcl_hash(s); }
00095 };
00096 
00097 struct TclHash2 {
00098   size_t operator()(const void *start, size_t len, size_t seed) const {
00099     return tcl_hash2(start, len, seed);
00100   }
00101 
00102   size_t operator()(const void *start, size_t len) const {
00103     return tcl_hash2(start, len, 0);
00104   }
00105 
00106   size_t operator()(const String& s) const {
00107     return tcl_hash2(s.c_str(), s.length(), 0);
00108   }
00109 
00110   size_t operator()(const char *s) const {
00111     return tcl_hash2(s, strlen(s), 0);
00112   }
00113 };
